title: Executive orders not passed by Congress

content.question: Since the 1970â€™s, Presidents have made use of executive orders at an increasing rate because executive orders

choices.label: are noncontroversial measures that can be easily implemented
do not need to be passed by Congress
must be ratified by the Senate rather than by the House

content.answer: do not need to be passed by Congress

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress
